How Uber Eats Its Own Dog Food: A Look at Internal Software Use and Product Evolution

May 7, 2025

Uber leverages its own technology extensively, from sophisticated experimentation platforms to internal tools and targeted beta programs. This post explores how dogfooding—using their own products—helps Uber innovate, refine, and occasionally, stumble.
